name: Invocação das Cartas
description:
We created a game where you are a mage who combines your cards to get through inaccessible places (we created several animations and arts to make the game even better)

Attack: "J" / Left Mouse

Roll: "K" / "SPACE"

Show Card : "CTRL"

Artist:Luis Eduardo

Programmer:Breno Marinho

Gamedesign:Luis Guilherme
